messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the risk if you are persuading a police officer?
risking arrest
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the risk if you are searching a room?
risking breaking things or spending too long there
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the risk if you are trying to read someone with Psychology?
studying a person too closely or asking prying questions
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the risk if it involves Cthulhu Mythos?
staring into the abyss of dark knowledge for so long that something looks back
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the risk if you are climbing a wall?
continuing even though it feels completely unsafe
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the difference between a pushed roll and a re-roll?
A pushed roll is not simply a re-roll; time always passes between rolls—it may be seconds or hours.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can Luck be pushed, or is it off-limits?
Only skill and characteristic rolls can be pushed, not Luck, Sanity, or combat rolls.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can rolls determining damage or Sanity loss be pushed?
Only skill and characteristic rolls can be pushed, not rolls to determine an amount of damage or Sanity loss.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Is the skill and difficulty level always the same after a pushed roll?
The skill and difficulty level normally remain unchanged, but may be modified if the situation changes.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can the doctor avoid repeating the formulae he found?
No, he frequently comes upon the same formulae, repeating them under his breath.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of rolls can be pushed?
skill and characteristic rolls
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can Luck be pushed?
No, only skill and characteristic rolls can be pushed
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does the Keeper do before foreshadowing failure?
The Keeper says, 'If you fail...' followed by details
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should the Keeper highlight when foreshadowing failure?
Things that would be apparent to the investigator
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can the investigator suggest consequences for failure?
Yes, players are welcome to offer their own suggestions
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why should the Keeper foreshadow consequences?
The player requests foreshadowing to clarify the dangers, or the Keeper chooses to foreshadow to highlight the danger or increase drama.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why should the Keeper focus on an interesting consequence?
It is imperative that the Keeper focuses on an interesting consequence, rather than flat failure.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where is more advice on foreshadowing offered?
More advice on foreshadowing is offered in Chapter 10: Playing the Game.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of foreshadowing in the game?
The purpose of foreshadowing is to highlight the danger or to increase the drama of the situation.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why would the Keeper hint at something that the investigator would not be aware of?
The Keeper might only hint at it (at the Keeper’s discretion).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why should the Keeper foreshadow the consequence?

The player requests foreshadowing to clarify the dangers or the player is aware of them and wants to gauge the risk, or the Keeper chooses to foreshadow to highlight the danger or to increase the drama of the situation.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Keeper's goal when choosing a consequence?
The Keeper should focus on an interesting consequence, rather than flat failure.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of roll is Harvey's player attempting to make?
A Stealth roll at Regular difficulty.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why does Harvey decide to try to hide in plain sight?
Because he believes it's only a matter of time before he is caught.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where is Harvey trying to hide?
Among the passing crowds in the main street.
